menu.title: Buttermilk Pancakes
menu.desc: Enjoy the rich taste of buttermilk in our soft, fluffy pancakes. A perfect way to sweeten up your day!

menu.title: Diner Double Burger
menu.desc: Our diner-style double burger is a perfect choice for lunch, with its mouth-watering flavor and satisfying size!

menu.title: Godzilla Milkshake
menu.desc: A legendary treat awaits you! Indulge in our Godzilla Milkshake for a sweet break.

menu.title: Countryside Delight
menu.desc: The classic taste of a countryside breakfast is here! Prepared with completely natural ingredients, our Countryside Delight invites you to a feast of flavors.

menu.title: Egg Attack
menu.desc: Enjoy this protein-packed meal, prepared with fresh ingredients for a perfect lunch experience.

menu.title: Oreo Dream
menu.desc: A perfect treat for Oreo lovers! Oreo Dream takes you to a sweet world of flavor, impossible to resist!

menu.title: Bacon Overflow
menu.desc: For the bacon lovers! Loaded with crispy bacon and other delicious elements, Bacon Overflow is the perfect way to kickstart your day.

menu.title: American Classic
menu.desc: Experience the classic flavors of American cuisine with this tasty lunch, offering unbeatable taste at a great price!

menu.title: Quarantine Buddy
menu.desc: Need a sweet escape during quarantine? Our Quarantine Buddy milkshake is here to lift your spirits!

menu.title: Bison Steak
menu.desc: The unique taste of bison meat combined with special spices and sauces. Bison Steak is the perfect choice for your dinner!
